attributes.review: I am sorry but this app is so bad I have downloaded tons of times because I support trump but the problem is that it doesn’t have notifications to know about stuff so I am sorry but I have to give this app a one star
attributes.title: This is not a good app

attributes.review: Awful app, it took forever to download! Not only that but I realized that Donald Trump is an awful person. They say everyone makes mistakes. Donald Trump’s parents made a mistake when he was born. Honestly this app keeps glitching out and showing me hentai pictures.
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: This garbage app looks like it was made by a mass of chewed up gum and gives even worse info than Fox news. They promote fascism, hate, and violence with every breath they take. And their crowd of sheep that they call supporters are even stupider. Dont get this app, its ugly in every form🤮🤮
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible

attributes.review: Why does this even exist?. Everything our “president” has said is just idiotic and not accurate. I don’t know how such an idiot got into office. He’s racist, homophobic, close minded and just a terrible person. Just no trump being president was a terrible idea and so was this app.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: The fact that this app spreads fake news is worrisome. It should not be on the apple store! Not only is it giving a bad image to apple itself but it is causing people to believe what the orange is saying. This app must be removed from here immediately!
attributes.title: Fake news

attributes.review: When I heard Trump was re running in 2020 I knew I had to get this app. My whole family went to every trump rally. At one rally the supporters are my grandpa! Yes are my grandpa. DONT GET THIS APP. It was only the cause of the chaos of the world today. To be honest I really need to talk to a manger about this!
attributes.title: This app ruined my life

attributes.review: I was just using the app and something really scary happend when I opened the app I kept seeing an orange pop on my screen so I turned my phone off and on went back to the app and the orange still popped on the screen
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: first of all this app has so many bugs and glitches possible. it’s not even accessible. you guys better fix it before Biden wins the election, because if you don’t then there will be no point of people downloading it.
attributes.title: bad

attributes.review: I can’t use my app it always shuts down my phone. I don’t know why but something about just isn’t right maybe the person it’s about😚✨. I hope they can change it to someone that works😌thank you for your time🧚‍♀️✨.
attributes.title: Gross😌✨🧚‍♀️☺️✨

attributes.review: I wanted to download this app to vote for trump but then a picture popped up and it was a pp I quickly turned off my phone and stared to cry because I don’t want to see that so don’t download this app and also black lives matter
attributes.title: Black lives matter
